intro: Orbea longii, commonly known as the longii orchid, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the Apocynaceae family. It is native to southern Africa, particularly South Africa, where it thrives in rocky and arid environments. The plant produces striking, showy flowers that are typically pink or white, with a distinctive tubular shape. Orbea longii is a succulent, meaning it has adapted to store water in its leaves and stems. Its botanical features make it a popular choice for succulent gardens and rockeries due to its resilience and ornamental value.
